articles.content: Happy Tuesday, Camden Chatters! I hope youre able to enjoy today even with the small losing streak the Orioles have embarked upon. Theyve now lost three games in a row, the first time that has happen… [+3712 chars]

articles.author: James Horncastle
articles.title: Inter were made from AC Milan. Never forget that: The story of the Milan derby - The Athletic
articles.description: AC Milan and Inter have spurred each other on for years. Expect this Champions League clash to be fierce and tense
articles.content: In hindsight, the 2005 derby was a shocking and enduring exception, a mischaracterisation. The rivalry known as the Madonnina in honour of the golden statue of the Madonna atop Milans whiter-than-whi… [+14687 chars]
